oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veteran's reunion ribbon and pin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: UCV reunion ribbon and pin from W. B. Tate Camp, No. 725. The ribbon belonged to Capt. Daniel Hoge Bruce, Co. A, 51st Va. Inf. Regt., CSA. The badge was manufactured by The Whitehead & Hoag Co. of Newark, N. J. See tsla108 for Bruce's diary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
